line_1: The youngest Brother ye wad whip
line_2: When MASONS' mystic word an' grip,

line_1: The youngest Brother ye wad whip
line_2: In storms an' tempests raise you up,

line_1: The youngest Brother ye wad whip
line_2: Some cock or cat, your rage maun stop,

line_1: The fear o' Hell's a hangman's whip,
line_2: But where ye feel your Honor grip,
